page.title: 19INDUSTRY
page.content: Manufacturing industry has declined in the south-west of the block during recent years. A number of factories stand empty. One such factory belonged to Rank Kershaw and had been extended only a few years before its closure. This factory was once a leading producer of precision optical equipment.Another factory just across Harehills Lane has been extensively altered and transformed into a "do it yourself" supermarket. An industrial estate for small businesses has been built on Ashton Road. Each unit is large enough for light industries, employing a handful of people. Some other industrial premises on Harehills Lane have been converted to offer high technology training in electronics and computers to young people and women. In this way, it is hoped, local will benefit from advanced technology.
